items.sentence: That is not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.
If you are not satisfied with your share, I'll make it a bit more attractive.
I was unwilling to agree to the proposal, but it seemed that I had no choice.
This will go down in history as the greatest event that has ever taken place.
I would've arrived earlier if there hadn't been a traffic jam on Park Street.
Tom has spent more time thinking about Mary than he's spent talking with her.
Tom isn't a very good boss because he has trouble delegating tasks to others.
I'm a bit down because a blogger friend of mine has decided to stop blogging.
Tom didn't think that what Mary was wearing was appropriate for the occasion.
Tom waters the potted plants on his porch every morning before going to work.
